results.title: Acetate, a Short-Chain Fatty Acid, Acutely Lowers Heart Rate and Cardiac Contractility Along with Blood Pressure.
results.text_hl: Inhibition of sympathetic tone by the selective @GENE_ADRB1 @GENE_11554 @@@beta-1 adrenergic receptor@@@ antagonist @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ blocks the acute @<m>DISEASE_Peroneal_Neuropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020427 @@@drop in HR@@@ seen with @CHEMICAL_Acetates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000085 @@@acetate@@@ administration, yet the decrease in mean arterial pressure persists.

citations.NLM: Poll BG, Xu J, Jun S, Sanchez J, Zaidman NA, He X, Lester L, Berkowitz DE, Paolocci N, Gao WD, Pluznick JL. Acetate, a Short-Chain Fatty Acid, Acutely Lowers Heart Rate and Cardiac Contractility Along with Blood Pressure. J Pharmacol Exp Ther. 2021 Apr;377(1):39-50. PMID: 33414131
citations.BibTeX: @article{33414131, title={Acetate, a Short-Chain Fatty Acid, Acutely Lowers Heart Rate and Cardiac Contractility Along with Blood Pressure.}, author={Poll BG and Xu J and Jun S and Sanchez J and Zaidman NA and He X and Lester L and Berkowitz DE and Paolocci N and Gao WD and Pluznick JL}, journal={J Pharmacol Exp Ther}, volume={377}, number={1}, pages={39-50}}

results.title: Ambulatory pressure monitoring in the assessment of antihypertensive therapy.
results.text_hl: Ambulatory monitoring of pressure improved the accuracy of the trial and demonstrated a reduction in the alerting response with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Coats AJ, Conway J, Somers VK, Isea JE, Sleight P. Ambulatory pressure monitoring in the assessment of antihypertensive therapy. Cardiovasc Drugs Ther. 1989 Jun;3 Suppl 1():303-11. PMID: 2487802
citations.BibTeX: @article{2487802, title={Ambulatory pressure monitoring in the assessment of antihypertensive therapy.}, author={Coats AJ and Conway J and Somers VK and Isea JE and Sleight P}, journal={Cardiovasc Drugs Ther}, volume={3 Suppl 1}, pages={303-11}}

results.title: Central serotonin and the control of arterial blood pressure and heart rate in infant rats: influence of sleep state and sex.
results.journal: Am J Physiol Regul Integr Comp Physiol
results.text_hl: Both genotypes experienced the same @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Peroneal_Neuropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020427 @@@drop in HR@@@.

citations.NLM: Magnusson JL, Cummings KJ. Central serotonin and the control of arterial blood pressure and heart rate in infant rats: influence of sleep state and sex. Am J Physiol Regul Integr Comp Physiol. 2018 Feb 1;314(2):R313-R321. PMID: 29046318
